channel.title: Comments on: Use CSS3 PIE for enabling CSS3 in IE
channel.description: The Development Blog of Gabe Shackle

item.title: By: Jason
item.dc:creator: Jason
item.description: ditto on Stephen's IE Zoom background-repeat issue.
item.content:encoded: ditto on Stephen’s IE Zoom background-repeat issue.

item.title: By: Gabe
item.dc:creator: Gabe
item.description: Good catch on that, Stephen. I haven't found anything yet to fix this but there was a note on the CSS3PIE forums stating that this is a known bug that's been submitted to the author. Hopefully a future update will resolve this!
item.content:encoded: Good catch on that, Stephen. I haven’t found anything yet to fix this but there was a note on the CSS3PIE forums stating that this is a known bug that’s been submitted to the author. Hopefully a future update will resolve this!

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description: When you zoom in IE, the background-image starts to repeat. It's a common error I've been trying to find a solution to for a while. If anyone has any ideas, please post them.
item.content:encoded: When you zoom in IE, the background-image starts to repeat. It’s a common error I’ve been trying to find a solution to for a while. If anyone has any ideas, please post them.
